title: well maintained 2 bedroom
map_address: 20878 Sun Meadow Trl near Sun Meadow Trl
posting_body: One floor, maintenance free living in this well maintained 2 bedroom, 2 full bath ranch style cluster home in Springfield Commons!

Open floor plan layout with a 14x10 kitchen with breakfast bar with seating including all appliances overlooking a 24x22 great room with plenty of room for a sectional couch and dining room set with a gas fireplace and French door leading to patio and back yard!
15x14 master bedroom w/ large full master bath with wall full of closets and walk-in extra closet or storage room with walk-up access to attic for extra storage with separate access to back patio!
2nd first level 14x11 bedroom with adjacent full bath.
first level laundry/utility room leading into heated garage with built-ins.
Newer Stamped concrete patio with white vinyl privacy fence overlooking extra deep wooded backyard offering plenty of privacy!

Situated in Springfield Commons Phase 2 with one of the lowest maintenance fees in the area of 100.00 a month covering year round exterior grass cutting and snow removal and conveniently located near Strongsville mall/shopping, restaurants and schools!
